dublin_core.dcvalue: Huai-Ming Sun, Senior Program Officer, World Education Inc., Email: hsun@worlded.org | Emmanuel Essandoh, HIV Prevention Specialist, USAID, Email: essandoh@usaid.gov

Platform uses bulk text messaging containing health education, HIV prevention, service and treatment messages. Subscribers are HIV+ and are able to use a call back feature to receive further counseling on minimizing transmission and other topics.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:20:11Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 empower_ii.pdf: 281590 bytes, checksum: 9e385046a6e1ee57b4473e9ad3135b1e (MD5)
Empowering and Mobilizing People living with HIV/AIDS (EMPower II)
Client education and behavior change communication, HIV/AIDS
